reviews.review: mano eu recomendo mt este jogo n sei explicar

I highly recommend against it. A lot of game breaking bugs, toxic community and slow matchmaking. Also it's highly depends on network latency, e.g. huntress can hit you when you're 3 meters around the corner or you can take a hit when you're 3 meters away from window. 
Some killers IMO are just not balanced, like Freddy or Spirit. 
And, again, bugs, bugs and one more bug. On some of the renewed maps survivors can hide inside the walls or you can get stuck in the rocks near the hill.
2/10 great idea, bad realization.
Рот ест, а эта хуйnya реальный высер
spooky killer chased me and i became meg main...

I would like to start off by saying this game has a lot of potential, and I really enjoy the concept of it. I will still play it, even though i do not recommend it. This game has some really fun ideas, and the game seemed to go somewhere decent a while back, but I think it is finished.
There are so many broken things in this game on both sides. Some killers are just strait up OP compared to the rest of the competition. while those killers stay on top, the other parts of the killers keep getting nerfed to the ground. Even the stronger killers of the game will get nerfed, but not the OP ones that need something changed.
On the other spectrum, there are combinations that make some killers rediculous (Huntress with iri-head infantry belt combo (gives her 3 insta-down hatchets)), but BHVR refuses to changes any of that.
There are things you can bring into the game that give huge advantages. survivors can bring keys that make it so much easier to escape, and killers can bring moris to only need 1 out of the 3 hooks to kill you. after years of people complaining about it on the forums, no changes have been made to them. but pig needs that nerf i guess.
Organized SWF 4 man groups are the definition of a 1 sided game. the only way you have a chance of winning is if they are the kind that focus on keeping everyone alive and you just sit at the hooked survivor. otherwise, good luck getting at least 1 kill.
The community in this game has some great people. while not the majority, the toxic people are the LOUDEST of any community i've ever seen. They ruin the fun of the game for anyone else while complaining that their side is completely underpowered and justified to what they do.
And, right as of now, the people making the final decisions of the game have never shown this much bias towards the whales of the game. In their biggest event of the year, they have decided that all skins must be purchased. Even last year, you were able to earn a currency to get 2 skins of your choice if you played enough, but now you MUST pay. While they are giving log in rewards as of this moment (until sometime at the start of november 2020), this doesnt fix the fact that we are not getting an event this year, because they have evolved from being inept decision makers to inept and greedy decision makers.
While I hope this game eventually gets people who know how to run their game (and maybe play it more than once to test out the next patch), This game is something that you should stick away from. If you really want to play through the toxic community and bugs that plague the game from the beginning, then only purchase the game and don't buy anything else. it is not worth it. as of me writing, the developers do not deserve the money from other people.

I actually really enjoy this game. But there is a glaring issue. The servers are horrible. I have a constant issue playing with my boyfriend because he can't ever connect. We would probably spend money on DLC if it werent for that horrible fact. It's infuriating.
黎明杀机，我心中的神作。但对于我的朋友们来说这个游戏很无趣。。。。。这让我非常恼火
Fun game, especially with friends.  I would suggest having someone decently experienced to help you and show you the ropes at first though, it helps a lot.

The game does really well with friends. However a single perk can ruin an entire game. I can't rightfully give this a thumbs up by how dependent your experience is on the killer.

Stay far far far away from this game. The game is horrible for survivors early on and horrible for killers that don't have thousands of hours later in the red-purple ranks. Those who play 1 side only bicker with each other, and those who play both sides opinion's are ignored. The game relies too heavily on the players to have fun, and the devs are clueless about their own game. I only play because I was sucked into the vortex, don't get caught. Run while you can
Great game for Adrenaline rushes and scares 8/10 for me, reason for the missing 2% is the only problem is the loading for match making takes up to 30min of waiting.

Dead by Daylight, a game that is vilified by its own players... and for good reason. This game doesn't deserve a long introduction like I usually give to other games.

Pros:
-Licensed characters are a fun inclusion for fans of Stranger Things, Halloween, Nightmare on Elm Street and more.
-The various killers all have cool concepts and backstories that have unrealized potential

Cons:
-The unlicensed survivors are all boring as hell
-Because survivors don't have unique stats, your choice of Laurie or meg doesn't matter once you get their teachable perks
-This game's perk balancing is atrocious. You will get trampled unless you have all or most of the meta perks
-Cosmetic items are a ripoff
-Even on Ultra graphics, this game still looks like crap
-Killer metas mean that you only stand a chance with killers like Freddy, Spirit, or Hag.
-Matchmaking is complete garbage. Red ranks are frequently matched together with green ranks.
-The developers don't listen to community complaints. In February of 2021, it took the developers roughly 23 days to fix a game breaking glitch that distorted hitboxes.
-The community is a toxic hellhole, but that is likely partially due to the devs negligence
to many bugs and developers make it so much harder to be a survivors  and this game encourages camping behavior

Dead by Daylight tem seus defeitos,contudo dá para se divertir mesmo ainda com os debuggs e bugs constante.Recomendo fortemente para jogar mais com grupos fechados(Entre Amigos) ou no mínimo em duo(Apenas mais um amigo)na qual sua esperiencia vai ser bem melhor do que sozinho,mais em quesito a cujo a produtora do game não costuma ajudar muito os sobreviventes na qual não se sabe o motivo plausivel em sua nota oficial(BeHavior)se pensa comprar o jogo em si recomendo fortemente promoções do jogo e de suas DLCS apesar de tudo este game proporciona momentos inesquecíceis de partida com bastante diversão podendo assim melhor com o tempo seus problemas ainda mais HitxBox(Travamentos constantes em momentos inesperados dentro do Game).

It's just good bro. Could get pretty toxic at times, but get it! 

It's an exhilarating, intense, and at times, scary game. I've played this game for over a year and I am still ''afraid'' 
Looking around, trying to find the killer as you hear the heart beat gets closer. It's just, wow. Get this game.

It can be fun at times, but the game is unbalanced in favor of Survivors (especially ones that are able to voice-chat), the moment-to-moment gameplay is monotonous, and it features every type of greedy monetization scheme EXCEPT loot boxes. 

Just stick with Friday the 13th: The Game. Sure, it's dead in terms of content, but it's still more fun to play.

The curve is kinda big with this one, but now that I'm a hundred hours in I really enjoy each match (even when I lose). If you can learn the looping strategies, you will be golden in this game. I'm not very good at looping, but I still have a great time.

it's 4 years old an makes more bugs then fixes with every update, toxic community (since there's no repercussions for harassing other players apparently), they need to stop releasing "new" content and focus on fixing there game. instead of putting in more killers/survivors they should put that effort on actual programming/bug/hitbox fixes. just because it "looks" better then before doesn't change that the game is broken, Gameplay > Graphics should be more important. 

(11/27/2020)Edit: wants to be nominated for "labor of love" what a joke. #4YearsBroken

(4/1/2021)Edit: This Game is Amazing, I've never seen such balanced gameplay. they must of hired some of the best programmers for how well this game preforms, an such a lovely community.

(4/14/2021)Edit: They'll never know how to update the game without breaking something else, HIRE BETTER PROGRAMMERS. if you stop spending money adding killers an working on visuals you'll have enough money to hire someone who's not off Fiverr.

(9/15/2021)Edit: I'm honestly just getting tired of all the BS in this game, an the sh!t that people get away with. This community is more toxic then COD & Overwatch combined due to the fact there's no repercussions for any negative actions in or out of this game. Friends are the only reason I still even play this, since playing solo is not fun at all unless you're playing the role of killer. it's supposed to be a 4vs1 but everyone only plays for themselves & sabotaging others if it means there escape, turning this "teambase" game into a BattleRoyal. an you're Forced to stay an play with them since you get penalized if leave the lobby, this game is only enjoyable when the DC banned is lifted. I shouldn't have to stay in a lobby if I get stuck with a bunch of toxic people, I should be allowed to leave that game without being punished.

(4/16/2022)Edit: I can't wait for this game to end up like Deathgarden
